Positive_Review: It was my partners 60th birthday and the hotel staff were amazing Receptionist were lovely They left a card cake and a bottle of wine The room was lovely at the back overlooking the garden The little things do make a big difference and it made his weekend Thank you we come to London a lot and we will be back

Negative_Review: Noisy air con so had to sleep with it switched off Very small window and opening to let air in so a bit stuffy in such a small room
Positive_Review: Liked the large garden space seating area outside for drinks

Negative_Review: At past midnight on 25 June front desk staff on duty a gentleman with short hair stubble beard was rude when asked why there was no one at the front desk A guy was checking in and no one was around He knocked at the door around My 16yr old son was waiting for 15 mins as well to get his luggage for deposit while we were off to Scotland the next day Front desk stout lady replied why don t you work here to know what it s like In the hospitality industry this is a no no Sad for my innocent son to face people who don t have a passion for what they do
Positive_Review: Location is quite good
Staff were attentive and friendly Room was large by London standards and the hotel garden was excellent especially for a Happy Hour cocktail
Comfortable bed and hotel generally Beautiful garden at the back a rare treat in London Staff were friendly and helpful and I would certainly book the hotel again when visiting The Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: I would have liked a better view from our room
Positive_Review: The secret garden is a little bit of heaven in a busy city Loved it to sit and have an iced chilled wine on a warm evening Peaceful

Negative_Review: Although room was a disabled room which we hadn t booked it was extremely comfortable and had all that we needed for a one night stay It would have been nice on checking in to be informed of this However would stay at this hotel again
Positive_Review: Exceptionally friendly helpful staff plus a delicious breakfast of smoked haddock poached eggs Also a little extra from buffet too Would recommend this hotel to family friends

Negative_Review: AC in room not cold breakfast not great quality
Positive_Review: Convenient location no traffic noise in the garden view room hearing birds singing in the treetops in the morning was lovely

Negative_Review: Be clearer on the fact that there it s no on site parking It s very vague and cost me am extra 46 Which hasn t been budgeted for
Positive_Review: Staff and breakfast were exceptionally nice

Beds were very comfortable linen good quality and bathroom facilities excellent On the sixth floor and slept very well I needed gluten free bread at breakfast and one of the ladies working in the restaurant went out of her way to help me I only wish I knew her name to give her a mention

The hotel is well located round the corner from Gloucester Road tube station It is within walking distance from Kensington High Street Knightsbridge Royal Albert Hall and museums Breakfast choices are plentiful and the food is really good Bar prices are not what one would expect from a London hotel for example less than 4 for a pint of draught Boddingtons Would stay there again

Negative_Review: Not value for money quite expensive for what it was Restaurant choices of food were very ltd if you don t like Thai food Just like any other hotel in the cheaper bracket so was slightly disappointed
Positive_Review: Staff nice Beds comfy 2 double beds brilliant Nice size TV

Negative_Review: this was my second time at the hotel the first time i booked the 2 level suite but this time beacuse we were 2 only we booked a room and it was very very very small 1 peron could move around the room at a time even our bags took the capacity thats left in the room
Positive_Review: the location was amazing tesco waitrose boots starbucks paul they were all across the street its a very safe area since we were 2 girls alone that was perfect and its on a main street which makes it very easy for uber drivers to get there or even to find a cab

Room good size although I had booked an executive room by mistake This gave access to executive lounge and free drinks canap s if wanted Breakfast also included but have to say no better than other hotels we have used in London Certainly great location for museums Royal Albert Hall etc

Negative_Review: Room size is smaller than I thought based on picture First impression isn t very good because bathroom and closet door is quite old And there is only a small window which is a little depressing I consider it to be a bit more expensive but maybe it s because of the good location
Positive_Review: Common area is very nice like breakfast etc

The location was great hotel was very close to the tube station which made it easy to get to all of the local attractions The hotel was modern staff were polite helpful and friendly and the bed was comfortable I would definitely recommend staying at this hotel

Negative_Review: Small double bad English breakfast could be better No fresh vegetables at all Serious drawback for people who keep diet
Positive_Review: Great location friendly staff

Negative_Review: There s a fly in our room when we checked in And the carpet hasn t been vacuumed Feel very dry inside of the room
Positive_Review: 2 minutes walk from Gloucester road station Walk distance to many tourist spots

Negative_Review: Breakfast not hot enough and bacon undercooked Plates cold too
Positive_Review: Garden is alovely extra Very comfortable hotel for the budget we had Its situation is perfect for getting around

The hotel is well located opposite Gloucester Road tube station There are shops and restaurants nearby and it is very easy to get to central London 15 mins Staff was very helpful arranging an early check in when we arrived at 10 00am Rooms well appointed and big by London standards My room faced the main road but with the windows closed there was no traffic noise I will definitely stay here again when I visit London

Negative_Review: towels looked a bit old considering it s been newly refurbished they probably just need to be bleached or something to restore that crisp whiteness
Positive_Review: My biggest fear when looking for a hotel is the state of the bathrooms and carpet so it took me a week of trawling through reviews and researching online to finally decide on a hotel to stay in And boy was it a relief and pleasant surprise when I arrived at this hotel As a professional interior designer myself I appreciate the style of the hotel decor very modern but warm and tasteful I know those wall coverings didn t come cheap It s quite evident that whoever was responsible for the design was meticulous and applied a very high attention to detail Concierge services were generally very accommodating Although when I called one evening asking for ice I was asked to contact room service directly the concierge from the previous two nights must have passed on the request to housekeeping without asking me to do it myself so being asked to contact room service directly was a bit of a put off It wouldn t have taken much effort to pass on the request to room service from the concierge s desk would it Housekeeping team was very thorough with the cleaning I found the room to be very clean and fresh and actually better in reality than the pictures I d seen online I particularly loved the lavender sleep aid that was left at the bedside it worked a treat

Comfy bed good buffet and order breakfast fitness room great location very near tube and on direct line to Heathrow and easy walking distance to Kensington Hyde Park and multiple museums It was even a nice evening walk from Westminster back to the hotel through multiple parks Lots of places to eat nearby

Negative_Review: The toilets on the lower ground floor were not well maintained
Positive_Review: Great location next to the underground station and shops great staff who were very friendly and a good choice at breakfast

Negative_Review: AC didnt work in our room first day called few times complained to woman at reception nothing happened Almost lost hope on 2nd day but manager Robert handled our problem very professionally and quick Breakfast is very limited
Positive_Review: Some staff is very polite and really try to help Room is good tea coffee iron small pleasant compliments

Negative_Review: Heating could not be switched off Feb 2017 But I didn t mind to much and didn t ask for help
Positive_Review: Good location tube just around the corner Friendly staff
Although we only stayed for one night nothing was too much trouble all of the staff were friendly and helpful it was a pleasure staying with you

Negative_Review: Check in girl was a bit grumpy check out staff were nice though
Positive_Review: Good location right opposite tube station Lovely room spacious with two big beds

Negative_Review: There was a repeated knocking noise in the evening possibly from bathroom plumbing The hairdryer wasnt hot enough
Positive_Review: Excellent location Comfortable bed and nice room with view of the garden Will definitely go back

Negative_Review: There was no heating and the AC which can blow warm air wasn t working succesfully
Positive_Review: Very close to Gloucester Road station tube Transportation to any place in London is really easy Nice rooms clean and well equipped very good wifi Good value for money

Stayed here many times in the past almost every time I am visiting London Refurbished rooms good english breakfast frienfly staff the guy at the reception sorry do not remember the name was all the money

It s a lovely hotel in a great location Room was in a quite part of the hotel overlooking the garden We have stayed here before and I know we will be returning Staff are really helpful and friendly Breakfast very good

Negative_Review: My bed could have been softer
Positive_Review: Loved the location It was my first time in London and I was pleased how close it was to key historical sites Kensington Plaza V A museum Natural History Museum and the tube

Negative_Review: It should have a shower compartment rather than having long bath at shower area
Positive_Review: The executive lounge was a good additional service provided with additional cost

Negative_Review: Front desk staff not at all welcoming or friendly
Positive_Review: Good location across from Gloucester Road tube Walking distance to museums and restaurants Buffet breakfast very good with good selection

Negative_Review: Nothing Just a great all round hotel
Positive_Review: Great location Wonderful staff nothing too much trouble Very friendly welcome and loved the room upgrade we where offered Room spot couldn t fault it

Negative_Review: Some facilities in the room wasn t true when I made my reservations for delox room like bathrobe and sleepers but l get them when I ask
Positive_Review: Location cleanliness staff were friendly and helpful garden in the hotel

Negative_Review: Skirting board was filthy and they also didn t come in till after 5pm to service room and I had to chase them up though housekeeping
Positive_Review: Convienient to tube and Albert hall
The room was spacious by London standards clean and quiet I was impressed by the attention to detail a complimentary Twix bar every day pillow spray and lavender to help you sleep better

Negative_Review: Reception staff are not the friendliest and helpful On the last night we had to sleep in birmingham we asked if we could get a refund which was not possible We then arrived just before 12 at the hotel the day after to ask if we could atleast get an extra hour just to freshen up before we left which they would not allow Considering we didnt sleep there the night before and didnt get a refund this was the least i thought they could have done
Positive_Review: I thought robert at the concierge was amazing He was very helpful and a delight to interact with

Negative_Review: Not enough coffee at breakfast my husband and I would have preferred our own pot as we like to have a couple of cups at breakfast The breakfast staff were happy to refill but you had to wait until someone was available So nothing major
Positive_Review: Nice comfortable bed room was on the 6th floor nice and quiet even though we were overlooking the main road Air con worked which was good as sometimes hotel rooms can be stuffy Good choice at breakfast even arriving at 9 50am I also used the gym which had a good amount of equipment Position of hotel excellent for museums and restaurants etc All staff very polite and accommodating Fantastic bar and bar staff So all together a pleasant experience

Negative_Review: Very noisy Traffic noises evident in suite 24 7 Bathrooms are crammed guess that s London standard After 1 week limited breakfast variety gets tiring
Positive_Review: Walking to many tourist attractions Convenient for bus and tube connections Friendly staff in all departments make stay memorable

Negative_Review: The head of concierge s manner is unacceptable He refused to keep our luggage whereas it s stated clearly that the hotel provides luggage storage If not because I ve paid for my next stay with the hotel again on on Thur I d have changed the hotel He harshly talked to me and my mother in front of the others and was not happy that the receptionist came to help clear the issue He s arrogant and at the same time racist in the way that he treated us His bad behavior really ruins our holidays
Positive_Review: No Positive
Lovely clean and quiet room very comfortable bed and nice smiling staff Great location opposite a tube station and a street full of excellent pubs caf s and restaurants

Negative_Review: The reception on the second day who promised a room change but did not inform the next shift although i had reminded him 3 times The room 108 for the first 2 nights was poor with small bed and poor water pressure in the shower
Positive_Review: Managed to change rooms for me on the third day Room 132 was much more comfortable

Negative_Review: Room not so spacious Corridors very dark Room and other service too slow and not always responsive Had to call a couple of times until requests are being met
Positive_Review: Good location next to tube and bus station Front desk staff very friendly Lobby very spacious and welcoming

Negative_Review: The hotel corridors and rooms smell like you re in a Indian restaurant Can t stand it and changed the hotel after 2 days even though I ve unpacked my staff The room was old The wood was splitting in stairs in suit room Does not worth the price Not so close to Knightsbridge 20 minutes walk
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Just very small point breakfast plates were cold and so were fried eggs
Positive_Review: We loved the location and the secret garden Room was lovely and clean woth lovely view of the garden Everything in the public rooms sparkled

Negative_Review: The rooms need more light tiny Windows not a good idea so need more lights
Positive_Review: Excellent location comfortable rooms and space lovely secret garden Room garden side was quite nice

Negative_Review: Unfortunately standard rooms are tiny bed for 2 persons is extremely narrow with a common duvet
Positive_Review: The location and the friendliness of staff The secret back garden

Negative_Review: Serving hot freshly made tea in a pot for each table instead of that from thermos
Positive_Review: Served breakfast with a smile and provided fresh ment for my black tea
Bed was so comfy The room facilities were excellent and very clean Bathroom was excellent Breakfast was very good Excellent choice Staff execellent

Negative_Review: The staff were not helpful At one point i called the reception to inquire why my fridge was locked she answered its because i didnt pay 50 pounds deposit I replyed no one asked me to pay and honestly i only wanted to use it to store groceries that i have just purchase Her answer is she will have to send a request to clear my fridge which should take untill tomorrow I guess buying a new fridge should take less time
Positive_Review: Location clean rooms

Negative_Review: The worst thing is the rooms we got were like cells or sealed rooms There were windows but basically next to a wall We felt very uncomfortable I think this should be mentioned in the room specifications on the website so customers can have a choice if they would like to pay more for a room with open view Besides the front desk staff were not really helpful We travelled in a group of 6 and 2 of us got a room on a different floor Booking was made well in advance and they could have made necessary arrangement for the group to stay on the same floor but not putting the blame on us for checking in late which was out of our control plus we did mention this on our booking It is something small and it s fine if they could not make a change but their attitude was poor and they didn t seem to care and show sincerity
Positive_Review: Location is great and just opposite to the Gloucester station

The cookie and chocolate bar that goes so well with the coffee and tea provided The table was a good size for working The fried rice at breakfast is very nice Robert concierge and Roberta receptionist were very helpful

Negative_Review: I have no suggestions for improvements It was excellent
Positive_Review: Room was spotless and roomy stall members were very polite and accommodating breakfast was excellent

Negative_Review: No coffee machine in room just a kettle and instant Fresh coffee only available at breakfast time
Positive_Review: Room spacious and clean beds comfortable we went to the hotels Asian restaurant for dinner food was fabulous and staff very attentive

Negative_Review: Without prejudice the service located at concierge has some work to do
Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet gardens and location also the good service provided at breakfast consistently at each and every morning

Negative_Review: i didnt think the hotel was worthy of its star rating as the rooms were small and not nice very dark and obviously been designered beyond need without understanding a guest only focussing on the dark felt headboard design the carpets were not so clean glasses were dirty and i had to call for fresh ones the shower room partition was nice in appearance but putting a toilet roll on the side of the bath fixing meant it became wet when the shower was used The mirrors steamed up fully and rendered them useless There was no guest slippers and i was pleased i brought my own face cloths It was evident that the hotel had focussed on appearance but not functionality having a full size ironing board in the long drop wardrobe section wasn t useful at all and the cut backs on guest facilities was in the wrong places tea and sugars literally stuffed in a tin on the side was very poor no valance on the bed showing the bad base was very poor the concierge was unable to give clear directions to the location and we were driving around to find parking which i understood was in the hotel but we found out was in another hotel over the main road a few hundred meters away the breakfast room s light but again very modernised and designered to look something its not really a prime example of Fur Coating something that s not covering its bare essentials first i could go on but really its not worth it as the hotel has fudged its star rating and i was extremely disappointed i will revert back to my previous hotel nearby for future bookings the lancaster is much better and has some quality in its tradition
Positive_Review: the choice of vegetarian sausage to make a real breakfast only took 15 mins to cook fresh and deliver to the table

Negative_Review: The staff was pleasant but not very informative as to where the breakfast area was coffee if not having breakfast or recommendations for pubs cafes etc
Positive_Review: Great location close to tube station Excellent breakfast Loved the complimentary sparkling water in the lobby Would definetly stay there again

Negative_Review: Air conditioning did not work upon first arrival Mini frig in room was ancient and could not get cold enough to safely store food That ancient mini frig should be tossed this is supposed to be a 4 star hotel Shower was one of those with inadequate water splash barrier so that it was an adventure to keep the floor dry seems to be intended for those who like to soak in a bath tub But the newer 4 star hotels provide full water splash barriers so that guests can keep the floor dry regardless of shower or soaking choice
Positive_Review: Quiet room Responsive staff when air conditioning was not working they made it work On his own initiative chief engineer placed an additional mini frig in the room when the permanent one could not get cold enough to safely store food All staff that met the guests were well trained in customer service

Negative_Review: I thought the d cor was a bit modern and bland for my taste
Positive_Review: Very spacious bedroom with really comfortable beds and choice of pillows The staff were warm and helpful

The hotel is in a perfect location room is big and well maintained very helpfull and polite staff Breakfast was very good cofy is served in the moment you get in We asked for a room towards the garden yes there is a nice one and got it right away

Negative_Review: The aircodition was not cooling althought after technecian did try to repair it did not cool i had to change my room after 2 day due to hotel being fu y booked i believe the sound from the room next door and the corridor was heard in my room
Positive_Review: No Positive

Nice hotel in a good location tube station across the road the Albert Hall 10 minute walk away lovely friendly staff every one helpful nothing to much trouble room very nice and clean and there is a nice private garden to sit outside good tasty breakfast with plenty of choice recommended by a friend who always stays here we will also stay here when we come to London again

Negative_Review: The shower was weak and the placement of the shower was too low for a tall person
Positive_Review: Nice quiet room Very clean and comfortable Nice garden Friendly staff Good value for money

Negative_Review: They didn t have any haddock when we ordered it In common with many hotels they need to learn how to cook eggs so that the white is cooked without the yoke being hard
Positive_Review: Very handy for the underground We liked the fact that you could order kippers haddock for breakfast

Negative_Review: This is not a budget hotel However you get what you pay Good hotels in London are expensive The hotel is situated in one of the most beautiful areas of central London however it s a little far from main attractions But tthe metro station is next to hotel and within 10 minutes you can be anywhere in the center
Positive_Review: We had a standard room and it was very comfortable pleasant and quite The staff was very helpful wifi was working good breakfast was excellent The hotel is situated in a very beautiful area next to metro station In general is a very good hotel with high level of service It fullfilled my expectations I will probably stay again in my next visit in London

Negative_Review: Room Service never arrived I ordered at 11 10pm and waited up although very tired and by 12 30 nothing had come so I phoned to cancel it Very tired the next day as lost an hour and a half sleep waiting for room service
Positive_Review: comfy bed

Negative_Review: Hotel gave us a free bottle of wine as anniversary trip however only left 1 glass addressed letter to husband even though I the wife did booking seemed a little old fashioned
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Lack of extended check out requested for only 2 hours more have been disappointing while travelling with a little baby and being IHg platinum member
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: This is not for the luxury travelled For the same amount of money you can stay in better places The gym is really run down it smells extremely bad The hotel staff extremely not helpful the dry clean service is extremely bad Staff would not give me a 2 hour late check out
Positive_Review: It s an ok location the lounge

Overall the hotel was good the staff were friendlyand breakfast was good Hotel s location it is located on area near to tube station and there are many restaurants caf s and post office It is few steps from museums I do recommend this hotel for anyone vist London

Negative_Review: It might be the norm in England but there was no ice machine in the building I didn t like drinking warm water Also there was no beer available to purchase from the mini bar I would have made that purchase several times if available
Positive_Review: The staff was extremely accommodating The free bottled water and candy provided daily was very much appreciated The room was quiet clean and comfortable Also due to the great location we were able to flag down a taxi within seconds each and every time Also there is a market directly across the street that we found to be reasonably priced

Negative_Review: I didn t really like the pillows because I prefer feathered ones and not so bulky but the staff were so nice I didn t want to mention it
Positive_Review: I liked the hotel in general the staff foyer bar area The bedroom bathroom perfect

Greeting on arrival was excellent We were early and our room wasn t ready so we were upgraded to a King sized room The room was overlooking the garden I always stay in this area of London but my first time to stay in Crowne Plaza The hotel is right beside the tube station The hotel staff are very friendly and room facilities are excellent I won t be returning to London until October but I know where I will be staying

Liked everything including the food Umami Asian restaurant attached to the hotel Even had a 50 off offer on which was great Staff were so helpful friendly cleanliness was excellent Room lovely warm Gloucester Rd tube station is literally round the corner Lots of cafes restaurants to suit all tastes budgets Cannot fault

Negative_Review: I think the price can be lowered also it wouild be good to have at least 1 or 2 more F n B outlets very restricted in terms of variety also i think the service could be improved for example no newspaper was delivered to me nor did i feel special being there i was just another guest
Positive_Review: i liked the friendly staff and the daily supply of good fresh apples and water also the computers for guest use and the overall ambience the location is what really did it for me

Negative_Review: A small stuffy room which didn t match the description deluxe or the price in our opinion To get to the 2nd bed required a sideways shuffle between the end of the beds and the desk There wasn t room to have the chair at the desk and you couldn t open the mini bar because the door was blocked by the bed The room didn t match the website photographs which show a suitable gap at the end of the bed We paid 40 to have an extra person in the room but there wasn t an extra set of towels extra coffee etc There was one biscuit packet and one chocolate bar between 3 of us which seemed a bit mean especially for a deluxe room Luckily we were able to settle who had what amicably We weren t inclined to use the bar lounge so cannot comment on the quality of these areas The receptionist was efficient but unsympathetic Her advise was to ask for a larger room on booking not something we would have thought necessary beforehand and we won t be booking again
Positive_Review: The beds were comfortable The hotel was generally clean and bright Several of the concierges evening managers were friendly and helpful Extra tea bags and milks were supplied on request Our bags were stored while we waited for a room and after check out

Negative_Review: We didn t think the breakfast was really great esp for the price
Positive_Review: The rooms were really clean and had great beds bedding bathrooms The hotel was in a perfect location next to the Underground Starbucks a grocery store several restaurants even the same underground as the Heathrow airport

Fabulous Club Lounge well worth paying the little bit extra for this facility Large room massive bed very comfy We were thrilled to return from a walk to discover a complimentary bottle of wine and a box of chocs for our wedding anniversary These little touches make the hotel special

Negative_Review: The aircon wasn t very effective and even though it was cold outside we struggled to get the room to cool down enough
Positive_Review: We needed a place to stay for the night close to the Albert Hall The room was well appointed with generous toiletries and towels and a super king size bed Great value for money and a good experience

Hotel was great and we appreciated the extra little touches like the chocolate bar in our room and lavender scented pillow spray Also only 5 10 min walk from V A Albert Hall Science Museum etc Nice friendly pub only a short walk away called The GloucesterArms and a lovely Itallian restaurant opposite the pub called Da Mario serving good food at sensible prices We will definitely return

Negative_Review: Very difficult one as liked everything but I asked for a pot of tea at breakfast as the big pot with tea in was luke warm Not a problem pot of tea was brought
Positive_Review: The little touches gorgeous apples in reception pillow spray for calm sleep very clean bathroom lots of towels nothing missing and yummy chocolate cake

Negative_Review: Certainly the room was large enough to accommodate a bit more wardrobe space
Positive_Review: Beds extra large lovely garden area Quiet well sized room good restaurant Modern decor Great area

Negative_Review: Not all the staff were welcoming
Positive_Review: The room overlooked the garden at the back and was quiet 2 queen beds were v comfortable and the reception staff gave us an early check in which was Sio appreciated after arriving from Australia Great breakfast and location near a tube station
Friendly staff Upgraded to a 1 bed suite and was so pleased I did Food from the restaurant was delicious which I had in the bar

Negative_Review: The room service was not excellent They don t change the soap And the cafe table was hidden in the closet Not practical location for the cafe
Positive_Review: Almost everything Location Free and fast wifi hospitality comfortable

Negative_Review: Wanted a desk for a laptop
Positive_Review: I stayed a couple of nights and it was comfortable The room was large enough for me and was clean and quiet Staffs are very friendly and helpful as they kindly guided the hotel and around the hotel I would stay there again if I come to London

Negative_Review: The mattresses and pillows were very uncomfortable I have been visiting over the last three years and the breakfast is the same no changes
Positive_Review: the refurb is good
The staff were very friendly Comfy bed Lovely breakfast Although our children were not with us the staff were Excellent in the restaurant with the children

Negative_Review: A pint of soda water in the bar was over 4 Almost the same price as a pint of beer The bed was a bit too hard for my preference end the duvet was a bit small for the bed
Positive_Review: Nice little touches such as champagne and chocolates for our special occasion plus a nice selection of toiletries and complimentary water tea and coffee in the room Breakfast was fresh and there was a good selection

Negative_Review: There were two generous pillows person could have done with a thinner one No slip resistant bath mat which for an older less flexible person is essential when exiting the bath shower
Positive_Review: The staff were welcoming and efficient the restaurant was excellent both food and staff The room was spacious and well equipped Location was brilliant and I appreciated the parking availability at the sister hotel around the corner

Negative_Review: You could have a small ramp at the front entrance which would make it easier to pull up heavy luggages instead of carrying it up that small flight of stairs
Positive_Review: It was a comfortable stay and great location The staff at the Amami restaurant were very helpful with good suggestions for the food selection on their menu Very good service for a weary traveler like me

Negative_Review: Crap view from the window but wouldn t put us off returning
Positive_Review: We enjoyed our stay and were happy with everything The toiletries and hairdryer were very useful and the staff were friendly We would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Typical of London our room was small Maybe it saved space but there was only bed side lighting on one side of the double bed The grout in the bathroom looked mouldy in places Almost felt like getting stuck into it with the White King and and a tooth brush
Positive_Review: The location close to the Gloucester Rd tube station on the Picadilly line for ease of access to Heathrow is very convenient Also lots of casual eateries close by Nice foyer and public areas We got a good early bird pay in advance rate

The hotel location was perfect The room was big perfectly clean very agreable and confortable In general de hotel is just perfect I also liked that the hotel looks new and clean and it was not very big

Negative_Review: Not the comfiest bed and we do like a nice duvet It got a little warm overnight and the heating air con blower was a little load Shut it off and opened the window The garden view from the first floor was actually of a flat roof but the church the other side was nice
Positive_Review: Location just around the corner from Gloucester Road tube and quite a few shops pubs and restaurants was good and on the 74 bus route to Marble Arch Easy walking distance to the Albert Hall and Kensington Gardens Good serve yourself breakfast but wish I d ordered the eggs benedict

Negative_Review: In room 332 the heating system was not working and the receptionist suggested bringing in a portable heater Of course I asked them to change the room which they did only after I insisted a lot I checked in at about 4 pm and we moved at 8 30 pm In the meantime we had to endure the cold in the room Not to mention the fact that room 332 is very small and I am not convinced even now that it was a Deluxe room with two twin bes which I had paid for I cannot explain to myself why the lady at the recepiton did not want to move us to another room there were obviouy other rooms available as it turned out in the end No slippers or gowns provided so take care and bring some from home
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: the executive lounge was not worth the additional money paid Service charge on all bar bills when exorbitant prices already being charged for the drinks
Positive_Review: Pleasant and helpful staff
Proximity to Underground attractions we were interested in and restaurants The room was clean and modern The view from our room was lovely The breakfast buffet was a real treat

Negative_Review: Bathroom door was creaky and door handle was falling off Bath tub shower head needed replacing
Positive_Review: The room was spacious front desk staff was friendly helpful The buffet breakfast was the best

Negative_Review: The receptionists were not hospitable No greetings just doesn t like other same level hotels
Positive_Review: Location is excellent Underground station just two minutes walk

having decided to take an executive club room we appreciated being upgraded and the facilities that were afforded were excellent particularly the club lounge The location for the RAH and museums was perfect The staff were very helpful and efficient

Negative_Review: Central heating was out of order They gave to us a portable heater One day our room was not cleaned as they came to clean it at 18 00 Not the best english breakfast i have seen
Positive_Review: Location just opposite underground station

Negative_Review: We stayed in 2 different rooms The a c is not working peopeely in both rooms and it s loud We realised that the rooms are cold and they gave us a heater It was kind but what if everyone was cold and there was no spare heater
Positive_Review: additional to my previous comment staff is great althoughe we always left the room around 2 oclock housekeeping cleaned our room and provided new towels everyday also the receptionists are very kind they always found a solution to our needs If you forget something such as tooth brush flip flops they provide that for free 2 bootles of water is free in the room

Negative_Review: Shower pressure could have been a bit more powerful for my liking
Positive_Review: Big room with 2 large double beds and modern bathroom Nice breakfast choice including cooked items and pastries etc Staff really friendly and helpful Good freebies such as water bottles in the room usual tea and coffee etc and apples in reception Looked like it had a nice bar and garden area if the weather had been warmer to sit out Excellent location near Gloucester Road tube station and only a 10 15 minute walk to South Kensington Plenty of restaurants nearby Would stay here again next time we come to London

Negative_Review: Had a few heating issues with the room and the temperature wasn t right Was too cold so we called someone to come and fix it which still didn t solve the problem unfortunately Also breakfast was fairly limited for a 4 star hotel
Positive_Review: Location is brilliant and staff are so so friendly Lovely quiet room

Everything about the Hotel is good We stayed for 5 nights in December and it was an excellent stay Right across the hotel is the station so easy commuting You can also take leisure walks to Harrods which is walk able Some of the museums were again close by Several Restaurants are near to this hotel Lovely staff and excellent place to stay Would definitely stay again

Negative_Review: Executive Lounge only open at certain times of the day
Positive_Review: Really comfy bed Staff were really pleasant and helpful Location was good for The Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: The room is already hot enough without the a c we were fine even as a Mediterranean but if you feel colder than a normal person the air coming from the a c was cold in the both rooms and it works so loud Breakfast we paid for the breakfast but regret that we already paid There are other restaurants and cafes just near the hotel you can have a better breakfast at a cheaper price
Positive_Review: Great location with a few steps away from underground and 10 mins away from the centre At night at 4 am taxi costs 16 pounds from leicester square to the hotel Staff they made everything to make us comfortable We told them to change our room to the back side of the hotel since the front side facing to the road can be a bit noisy And the reception sent a guy to move all our stuff and back side was so silent And even we forgot to hang please clean my room thing we found our room tidied up Thanks we loved the two double beds they were comfortable And huge tv and mirror is nice Rooms are big enough Overall we loved it and extended our stay and we hope also in the following days everything will be fine Full experience will be provided at the end of our stay in a seperate comment Gym is okay but enough for the one who does not want to give a break even in the holidays

Big room comfortable beds nice extra touches in room like free water pillow spray and chocolate bar Breakfast good choice could choose off buffet and food cooked to order Definitely will be using again when in London
Friendly helpful staff ideally placed and with walking distance of Royal Albert Hall Fantastic Breakfast Close to Gloucester Road Tube station

Negative_Review: We made our reservation at booking com We did not take a prepaid rate so that we could have flexibility and had full cancellation We were booked for an 8 day stay Because the room was so small we changed our plans and decided to check out after a few days The hotel charged us an extra 50 GBP fee to check out This fee was not mentioned in the booking com terms and conditions We were surprised as we have never paid at other hotels to check out earlier We were fine to pay for the days we stayed but felt the extra fee was no outlined anywhere and was unfair We should pay only for the days we stayed
Positive_Review: Great location and great staff Good breakfast
Friendy staff Big and cozy room Nice and rich breakfast Hotel is located on area close and in walking distance to the shopping area

Negative_Review: There was no desk in the room and the wardrobe was so small and occupied by the tea coffee set so little room for our cloths and other things
Positive_Review: I liked the room that was spacious with two double bed and the location and the breakfast

Negative_Review: We arrived at 9am and they were not prepared to let is in until 2pm even though we had requested for an early checkin at the time of booking They said the rooms are vacated but our room service takes time to orepare the room Which could ve been managed easier by them to allow us in at least by noon
Positive_Review: The location is fabulous one min walk to the tube station Facilities were good too for a business stay though The staff were reasonably good but not beyond expectations I would say And the rates were fair for a reputable hotel

Negative_Review: Very poor tea and coffee at breakfast No coat hooks in the room Weak shower
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff Big and comfortable beds Good quality cooked breakfast
Club lounge facilities i e free food drinks were excellent great value if you book a club room Biggest most comfy bed I have stayed in any UK hotel Hotel rear garden is a rare real little gem

fantastic location 2 mins away from Gloucester station While on a busy road we were lucky in that there was no noise inside the room The hotel also serves a great breakfast and for a London property has a pretty decent gym to be used on a wet day the rooms are also quite spacious and nice
Fantastic hotel We can t wait to go back Rooms are lovely and spacious I have stayed here on two separate occasions the beds are really comfortable which makes your stay even better
Excellent place outstanding location kind and competent personnel Very good breakfast Asian restaurant Umami worthwhile

Negative_Review: Unfortunately our room was next to lift and as I am a light sleeper it was a bit annoying although in general there was little noise from other guests
Positive_Review: The location for us was excellent within walking distance of everywhere we wanted to go The room was clean spacious and at the back of the hotel so potentially quiet The complimentary items were all of good quality

Negative_Review: Lack of staff at breakfast meant slow poor service also the breakfast lacked cooked vegetables so there was only eggs to go with bacon nothing else
Positive_Review: Location cleanliness

Negative_Review: The mattress was a little hard for our taste and they should include a top sheet on the bed It was either the duvet or nothing But of course we did not ask for one either which if we had I am sure they would have provided one We loved our room and bathroom though
Positive_Review: We loved the concierge lounge to relax in after walking all day Breakfasts were delicious and the bar at night had a great ambiance Everyone was very helpful and polite One reason we picked this hotel was because it was one of the few with an outdoor terrace to enjoy The September weather was beautiful so it was perfect

Negative_Review: The Club facilities were extremely poor Food provided in club lounge was very basic and limited in veriety Only one type of beer which was not even cold The coffee machine was closed down after 9 30 PM On departure my credit card was overcharged from the agreed amount in my booking com confirmation
Positive_Review: location was adequate

Negative_Review: Lack of information at the receptionist which took time to find the name and reservation although I gave her copy of the reservation but he didn t look on and thank god that I found other copy to save breakfast money although I made my reservation 4 months ahead I fund that the room rate on the same date reservation cheaper nd if you buy voucher for break fast at reception on arrival breakfast cost is 15 pound only what a hell of policy
Positive_Review: 1 I asked for a meeting with lady which is the gm never met she sent me her assistant is she the prime minister of Italy 2 I booked with breakfast and the receptions when I checked informed no break fast for you I thought that I didn t do it I paid for the breakfast as much as 17 5 pond for next day then I found the confirmed reservation it was clear that I paid 17 75 pound per person x 2 for 5 days I took it to them then they said no its with breakfast they made payment back through American Express
